Bluetooth based multiplayer word puzzle\n Plus High School Memories. \nSource -> github.com/somveersaini/BluePuzzle

This is a Two-Player game. You can play this game in two modes
1. Via Bluetooth
 Connect to the other Bluetooth enabled phone running Blue Puzzle by clicking on Bluetooth icon at top right corner or in game menu. And you are ready to play

2. Via phone passing
 You can enjoy this game with your friend on same device if u trust them enough. You have to pass the device turn by turn.
 Gameplay 
In this Game, each player needs to maximize the score by making dictionary words in the game grid. One alphabet in one turn 
 Enjoy!!!!

Notes 
*Slide from left and right to access game menu. 
**Tap on images to rotate them. 
***Check Status of your game in game menu Logs.
